output.sentences: So many soldiers die in service for their country.
Jenny was sad to know her husband, a proud Marine, was now in that category.
She was sad and lonely knowing he would never come back to her.
However, she remembers how proudly he wore his uniform and what it really meant to him to be able to fight for freedom.
Jenny looked on the bright side; he died doing what he loved most and that gave her great comfort!
